thread.title: BREAKING: Trump nominee Jeff Sessions appointed US Attorney General
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump nominee Jeff Sessions appointed US Attorney General

title: BREAKING: Trump nominee Jeff Sessions appointed US Attorney General
text:
BREAKING: Trump nominee Jeff Sessions appointed US Attorney General BREAKING: Trump nominee Jeff Sessions appointed US Attorney General JEFF Sessions has been appointed US Attorney General after a vote in the Senate. PUBLISHED: 00:24, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 | UPDATED: 00:42, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 GETTY Alabama senator Jeff Sessions has been confirmed as US Attorney General 
The former Alabama senator was installed as the head of the US department of justice after the Senate narrowly voted 52-47 in favour of the Republican. 
President Donald Trump nominated Mr Sessions, a Trump sympathiser. 
Mr Sessions is known for his tough stance on immigration. 
More to followâ€¦
